LanguageData.Bullet_ChargeRifle.label: charge shot
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.label: R4 Charge Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.description: A charged-shot assault rifle. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: R4 Charge Rifle
